sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Eleaven choice sermons as they were delivered by that late reverend divine, Thomas Westfield ... Westfield, Thomas, 1573-1644.
[7], 176, 82 p.
Printed for J.D. and part of the impression to be vended for the use of Thomas Gibbes, Gent., London : 1655.
Epistle to the reader signed: T.S. "I have perused these sermons upon Psalmes 106:19, 20, &c., and judging them to be pious and profitable, I allow them to be printed and published. John Downame"--T.p. verso. Imperfect: stained, with print show-through. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======

John Downame"--T.p. verso. Imperfect: stained, with print show-through. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
